ComicInfo.Summary: Meet Gully, the only daughter of Aramus, as she reads a story on a stormy night at home with her nanny awaiting her fathers return. Unknown to her, her father has a trap set to catch people posing as royal guards. Royal guards arrive who have been searching for the missing Aramus ask for shelter from the storm and once inside they transform into the were-men. and take out Aramus and his men with ease. Nanny knows the plan and knows the men are there for the box. She takes Gully and gets her out of the house with the box and locking herself inside gives Gully time to escape and take the box to safety.
